pkgmetadata.longdescription:
YaSpeak

Python wrapper for Yandex text voiceover![pypi](https://badge.fury.io/py/yaspeak.svg)
## Install`pip install --upgrade yaspeak`## Usage```pythonfrom yaspeak import YaSpeakysp = YaSpeak()ysp.oksana("hello", "oksana.mp3")ysp.levitan("hello", "levitan.mp3")ysp.yandex("hello", "yandex.mp3")```
